languages.text: "Пропадают узники? Куда бежать с каторги, когда весь мир вокруг — тюремная клетка? Нет, шерин, эти ашмаги отыскали какую-то сеть контрабандистских туннелей, где и прячутся. А рисунки — это их тайный язык, которым они отдают приказы соратникам в неволе. Я знаю ребят, умеющих искать такие тайные места и разгадывать языки".

"Disappearing prisoners? What is the point of running away from penal servitude if the entire world is a prison cell? No, shereen, these ashmags have found some sort of smuggling tunnel network and are hiding there. And the drawings are their secret language, which they use to give orders to their fellow prisoners. I know some guys who can find such secret places and decipher these languages."
languages.original_text: "Пропадают узники? Куда бежать с каторги, когда весь мир вокруг — тюремная клетка? Нет, шерин, эти ашмаги отыскали какую-то сеть контрабандистских туннелей, где и прячутся. А рисунки — это их тайный язык, которым они отдают приказы соратникам в неволе. Я знаю ребят, умеющих искать такие тайные места и разгадывать языки".

traits.locale_text: "Disappearing prisoners? What is the point of running away from the penal servitude,if the entire world is a prison cell? No, shereen, these ashmags have found some sort of smuggling tunnel network, and are hiding there. And drawings are their secret language, which they use to give orders to the fellow prisoners. I know some guys who can find such secret places and decipher the languages."

"Disappearing prisoners? What is the point of running away from the penal servitude,if the entire world is a prison cell? No, shereen, these ashmags have found some sort of smuggling tunnel network, and are hiding there. And drawings are their secret language, which they use to give orders to the fellow prisoners. I know some guys who can find such secret places and decipher the languages."

No, shereen, these ashmags have found some sort of smuggling tunnel network and are hiding there. And the drawings are their secret language, which they use to give orders to their fellow prisoners. I know some guys who can find such secret places and decipher these languages."

"Disappearing prisoners? What is the point of running away from penal servitude if the entire world is a prison cell? No, shereen, these ashmags have found some sort of smuggling tunnel network and are hiding there. And the drawings are their secret language, which they use to give orders to their fellow prisoners. I know some guys who can find such secret places and decipher these languages."

"Disappearing prisoners? What is the point of running away from penal servitude if the entire world is a prison cell? No, shereen, these ashmags have found some sort of smuggling tunnel network and are hiding there. And the drawings are their secret language, which they use to give orders to their fellow prisoners. I know some guys who can find such secret places and decipher these languages."

"Disappearing prisoners? What is the point of running away from penal servitude if the entire world is a prison cell? No, shereen, these ashmags have found some sort of smuggling tunnel network and are hiding there. And the drawings are their secret language, which they use to give orders to their fellow prisoners. I know some guys who can find such secret places and decipher these languages."

languages.text: “囚犯消失不见了？如果整个世界都是监狱，那逃离刑罚又有什么意义呢？不，亲爱的，这群坏种肯定是发现了某种走私隧道网，之后藏了起来。这些涂鸦是他们的暗号，用来指挥其他囚犯。我认识一些人，他们能破译这种语言，找到那些隐秘的藏身处。”
languages.original_text: "Disappearing prisoners? What is the point of running away from penal servitude if the entire world is a prison cell? No, shereen, these ashmags have found some sort of smuggling tunnel network and are hiding there. And the drawings are their secret language, which they use to give orders to their fellow prisoners. I know some guys who can find such secret places and decipher these languages."

traits.locale_text: “囚犯消失不见了？如果整个世界都是监狱，那逃离刑罚又有什么意义呢？不，亲爱的，这群坏家伙肯定是发现了某种走私隧道网，之后藏了起来。这些涂鸦是他们的暗号，用来指挥其他囚犯。我认识一些人，他们能破译这种语言，找到那些隐秘的藏身处。”

languages.text: «¿Presos que desaparecen? ¿Qué sentido tiene huir de la servidumbre penal si el mundo entero es una celda? No, shereen, estos ashmags han encontrado una especie de red de túneles de contrabando y se esconden allí. Y los dibujos son su lenguaje secreto, que utilizan para dar órdenes a sus compañeros de prisión. Conozco a algunos tipos que pueden encontrar esos lugares secretos y descifrar esos lenguajes».
languages.original_text: "Disappearing prisoners? What is the point of running away from penal servitude if the entire world is a prison cell? No, shereen, these ashmags have found some sort of smuggling tunnel network and are hiding there. And the drawings are their secret language, which they use to give orders to their fellow prisoners. I know some guys who can find such secret places and decipher these languages."

traits.locale_text: «¿Presos que desaparecen? ¿Qué sentido tiene huir de la servidumbre penal si el mundo entero es una celda? No, shereen, estos ashmags han encontrado una especie de red de túneles de contrabando y se esconden allí. Y los dibujos son su lenguaje secreto, que utilizan para dar órdenes a sus compañeros de prisión. Conozco a algunos tipos que pueden encontrar esos lugares secretos y descifrar esos lenguajes».

languages.text: 「囚人が姿を消す？惑星全体が牢獄のセルだと言うのに、徒刑から逃げ出したところで何の意味があるんだ？違うよ、シェリーン。クソどもは密輸用の坑道網を見つけ、そこに隠れているんだ。絵は奴らの秘密の言語で、囚人仲間に命令するときに使う。こういった秘密の場所を見つけて、これらの言語を解読できる奴らを何人か知っているぞ」
languages.original_text: "Disappearing prisoners? What is the point of running away from penal servitude if the entire world is a prison cell? No, shereen, these ashmags have found some sort of smuggling tunnel network and are hiding there. And the drawings are their secret language, which they use to give orders to their fellow prisoners. I know some guys who can find such secret places and decipher these languages."

traits.locale_text: 「囚人が姿を消す？惑星全体が牢獄のセルだと言うのに、徒刑から逃げ出したところで何の意味があるんだ？違うよ、シャリーン。クソどもは密輸用の坑道網を見つけ、そこに隠れているんだ。絵は奴らの秘密の言語で、囚人仲間に命令するときに使う。こういった秘密の場所を見つけて、これらの言語を解読できる奴らを何人か知っているぞ」

languages.text: « Des détenus qui disparaissent ? Quel intérêt de fuir la servitude pénale si le monde lui-même est une gigantesque prison ? Non, shereen... Ces ashmags ont découvert une sorte de réseau de tunnels de contrebandiers et ils s'y cachent. Ces dessins doivent être le langage secret avec lequel ils transmettent leurs ordres aux autres détenus... Je connais des types capables de découvrir des endroits secrets et de déchiffrer ce type de langages. »
languages.original_text: "Disappearing prisoners? What is the point of running away from penal servitude if the entire world is a prison cell? No, shereen, these ashmags have found some sort of smuggling tunnel network and are hiding there. And the drawings are their secret language, which they use to give orders to their fellow prisoners. I know some guys who can find such secret places and decipher these languages."

traits.locale_text: « Des détenus qui disparaissent ? Quel intérêt de fuir la servitude pénale si le monde lui-même est une gigantesque prison ? Non, shereen... Ces ashmags ont découvert une sorte de réseau de tunnels de contrebandiers et ils s'y cachent. Ces dessins doivent être le langage secret avec lequel ils transmettent leurs ordres aux autres détenus... Je connais des types capables de découvrir des endroits secrets et de déchiffrer ce type de langages. »

languages.text: "Verschwundene Gefangene? Wozu aus der Zwangsarbeit fliehen, wenn die gesamte Welt eine Gefängniszelle ist? Nein, Shereen, diese Ashmags haben ein Netzwerk von Schmugglertunneln gefunden und verstecken sich dort. Und die Zeichnungen sind ihre Geheimsprache, mit der sie ihren Mitgefangenen Befehle erteilen. Ich kenne Leute, die solche Verstecke finden und solche Sprachen entziffern können."
languages.original_text: "Disappearing prisoners? What is the point of running away from penal servitude if the entire world is a prison cell? No, shereen, these ashmags have found some sort of smuggling tunnel network and are hiding there. And the drawings are their secret language, which they use to give orders to their fellow prisoners. I know some guys who can find such secret places and decipher these languages."

traits.locale_text: "Verschwundene Gefangene? Wozu aus der Zwangsarbeit fliehen, wenn die gesamte Welt eine Gefängniszelle ist? Nein, Shereen, diese Ashmags haben ein Netzwerk von Schmugglertunneln gefunden und verstecken sich dort. Und die Zeichnungen sind ihre Geheimsprache, mit der sie ihren Mitgefangenen Befehle erteilen. Ich kenne Leute, die solche Verstecke finden und solche Sprachen entziffern können."

languages.text: "Kaybolan mahkûmlar mı? Dünyanın tamamı bir koğuş hücresinden ibaretken hapisten kaçmanın anlamı ne ki? Yok şirinim, bu külboğazlar kaçakçı yollarından oluşan bir ağ bulmuş ve orada saklanıyor olmalı. Çizimler de şüphesiz ki mahkûm yoldaşlarına emir vermekte kullandıkları gizli dilleridir. Gizli mekânlarını bulup dillerini deşifre edebilecek bazı kimseler tanıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Disappearing prisoners? What is the point of running away from penal servitude if the entire world is a prison cell? No, shereen, these ashmags have found some sort of smuggling tunnel network and are hiding there. And the drawings are their secret language, which they use to give orders to their fellow prisoners. I know some guys who can find such secret places and decipher these languages."
